基礎能力は十分育っているようなので\\nスキルを獲得しましょう。: Your stats seems well developed.\nLet's acquire some skills.
スピードが不足しているようなので\\n重点的に鍛えてみましょう。: Your speed seems a bit low.\nLet's focus on training it.
スタミナが不足しているようなので\\n重点的に鍛えてみましょう。: Your stamina seems a bit low.\nLet's focus on training it.
パワーが不足しているようなので\\n重点的に鍛えてみましょう。: Your power seems a bit low.\nLet's focus on training it.
根性が不足しているようなので\\n重点的に鍛えてみましょう。: Your guts seems a bit low.\nLet's focus on training it.
賢さが不足しているようなので\\n重点的に鍛えてみましょう。: Your wisdom seems a bit low.\nLet's focus on training it.
ファン不足で目標のレースに出走\\nできません。レースに出走しましょう。: You lack the minimum amount of fans\nfor the target race, let's run in a race.
このままでは目標のファン数に到達\\nできません。レースに出走しましょう。: You can't reach the target number\n of fans as it is. Let's do some race.
目標としてきたレース当日ですね。\\nあとはレースの結果を見守りましょう。: It's the day of the race we've been\naiming for. Let's keep an eye on the results.
トレーニングに差し支えのある状態に\\nなっているので保健室に行きましょう。: The condition seems unsuitable for\ntraining. Let's go to the infirmary.
体力が低いのでケガの恐れがあります。\\nお出かけしてリフレッシュしましょう。: Fatigue may cause injury in training.\n Let's rest and recover some energy.
デビューまでの調整期間です。\\nトレーニングをしっかりやりましょう。: It's adjustment period before debut.\nLet's take the time to train well.
未勝利のままでは9月以降育成を続行\\nできません。レースで勝利しましょう。: You need to win a race before\nSeptember. Let's win a race.
未勝利のため目標のレースに出走\\nできません。レースに出走しましょう。: You cannot participate in the\ntarget race. Let's win some race.
このままでは目標を達成できません。\\nレースに出走しましょう。: You can't achieve the goal as it is.\nLet's do some race.
ついつい夜ふかしをしてしまう\\n寝不足で体力が下がることがある: Stays up late at night.\nMay lose energy due to lack of sleep
今日は練習に行かなくてもいっか……\\nトレーニングに来ないことがある: Eh, who cares about training?\nSometimes just skips training.
肌あれが気になるお年頃\\nやる気が下がってしまうことがある: At the age worrying about complexion.\nMay feel discouraged to train.
食べ過ぎで体がちょっと太め\\nトレーニングでスピードが上がらなくなる: Ate too much and got fat.\nCan't train speed.
片頭痛でちょっと憂鬱な気分\\nやる気が上がらなくなる: Migraine ruins the mood…\nNot feeling motivated.
おっと……足元には気を付けて！\\nトレーニングが失敗しやすい: Whoops! Watch your steps!\nIncreased training fail rate
一緒に練習すると楽しいね！\\nトレーニング相手ともっと仲良くなれる: It's fun exercising together!\nGet to know your training partner better.
練習でも準備は怠りません\\nトレーニングが失敗しにくい: Be prepared even in practice.\nDecreased training fail rate.
丁寧な練習で明日の勝利をつかもう\\nトレーニングがとても失敗しにくい: Victory through careful practice.\nDecreased training fail rate.
原因不明の不調で心も体も沈む……\\n秋までトレーニングがとても失敗しやすい: I'm feeling depressed… Increased\ntraining fail rate until autumn.
レース中間からロングスパートをかけて\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>From the middle of the race slightly increase your speed by running a long spurt</size>
残り200mを切って前の方にいると\\n競り合いに強くなり速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Increase speed and power when close to the lead in last 200m</size>
レース後半で1番を\\nキープし続ける力をわずかに発揮する: <size=22>Be in the lead during the 2nd half of the race to gain slightly more power to help you stay in 1st place</size>
最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと\\n末脚を使って速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when passing in the back in Final Leg straight.</size>
最終直線で余力を持って前にいると\\nわずかに優位を保ちやすくなる: <size=22>Slightly easier to keep advantage if you have enough strength in the Final Leg straight</size>
最終コーナーで後ろから追い抜くと\\n女帝たる走りで速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when passing in the back in last corner</size>
最終コーナーで前の方で競り合うと\\n直線でわずかに抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>Slightly easier to break away when competing in the last corner</size>
レース終盤のコーナーで前の位置に\\nつこうとして加速力が少し上がる: <size=22>Gain a slight increase in acceleration as you attempt to gain positions during the last corner of the race</size>
レース後半のコーナーで控えていると\\n持久力が少し回復する: <size=22>Gain a slight increase in acceleration as you attempt to gain positions during the last corner of the race</size>
最終直線で競り合いに負けない\\n気持ちが湧き、速度が少し上がる: <size=22>On the final straight your desire not to lose, slightly increases your speed</size>
レース後半に前の方で競り合うとバク\\nシン力（？）を発揮、速度が少し上がる: <size=22>While fighting for the lead during the second part of the race, increase your speed slightly through displaying your Bakushin power</size>
レース中盤で好位置にいる時に\\n持久力が少し回復する: <size=22>Be in a good position during the middle stage of the race to slightly recover your endurance</size>
最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くの\\nウマ娘を見て持久力を少し回復する: <size=22>Being at the back during the last corner, slightly restores your endurance when you see another horse girl</size>
レース終盤に前方が詰まると\\nお告げの力で少し道を切り開く: <size=22>If during the last leg of the race your way to the front of the field is blocked, your power of divination will make it slightly easier to spot an opening</size>
レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうに\\nなると闘志に火が付き速度が少し上がる: <size=22>When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, you gain a little bit more fighting spirit and slightly increase your speed</size>
レースを冷静に運ぶことができると\\n残り200mで実力発揮、速度が上がる: <size=22>If you can get calm and composed through the race, you will be able to showcase your ability and increase your speed for the last 200m</size>
レース終盤に前の方で相手を抜くと\\n勢いに乗って速度が上がる: <size=22>Overtake the opponent in front of you during the last leg of the race to gain momentum and increase your speed</size>
最終直線で差を付けて先頭にいると\\nさらなる脚を使って、速度を上げる: <size=22>Be in the lead with a gap behind you at the last straight to increase your speed even more through your legs</size>
最終直線で前と差が詰まると\\n華麗な脚取りで速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>Close down the leader on the final straight to greatly increase your speed even further through your brilliant leg work</size>
最終コーナー以降で前の方にいると\\nギアを変えて加速力が上がる: <size=22>Be close to the leader at the final corner to increase your acceleration by changing gears</size>
残り200m地点で前の方にいると\\n道を開いてすごく抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>Be close to the lead during the last 200m to make it easier to break through and find a way through the field</size>
最終コーナーで好位置にいると\\n弾みを付けて加速力が上がる: <size=22>Be in a good position at the last corner to gain momentum and increase your acceleration</size>
最終コーナーで前の方にいると\\n抜かさせない覚悟を決めて速度が上がる: <size=22>Be close to the lead in the final corner to gain speed as you resolve yourself to not be overtaken</size>
最終コーナーで前の方で競り合うと\\n王たる輝きで速度が上がる: <size=22>Fight for the lead at the last corner to increase your speed through your kingly radiance</size>
レース終盤に3回追い抜くと\\n最終直線で速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>During the last leg of the race make three overtakes to strongly increase your speed on the final straight</size>
最終直線までみずから崩れることなく\\n前の方にいると速度が上がる: <size=22>Lead by yourself without letting up until the final straight to increase your speed</size>
最終直線で抜け出した時に\\n強い意志を持って速度が上がる: <size=22>Break away on the last straight to steel your will and increase your speed</size>
左回りコースが少し得意になる: <size=22>Become slightly better at left counterclockwise track</size>
左回りコースが少し苦手になる: <size=22>Become slightly worse at left counterclockwise track</size>

非根幹距離（400mの倍数以外）が\\n少し苦手になる: <size=22>Become slightly worse at Non-Core Distances (Not Multiples of 400m)</size>

自分と同じ作戦のウマ娘がいないと\\n能力を発揮しやすい: <size=22>Showing off your ability becomes easier when no other girls share your strategy</size>
自分と同じ作戦のウマ娘がいないと\\n能力を少し発揮しやすい: <size=22>Showing off your ability becomes a little easier when no other girls share your strategy</size>
自分と同じ作戦のウマ娘が6人以上だと\\n能力を発揮しやすい: <size=22>Become better at showing off your ability when at least 6 other girls share your strategy</size>
自分と同じ作戦のウマ娘が6人以上だと\\n能力を少し発揮しやすい: <size=22>Become a little better at showing off your ability when at least 6 other girls share your strategy</size>
自分と同じ作戦のウマ娘が6人以上だと\\n能力を少し発揮しにくい: <size=22>Harder at showing off your ability when at least 6 other girls share your strateg</size>
1番人気のウマ娘と作戦が同じだと\\n能力を発揮しやすい: <size=22>Become better at showing off your ability when sharing a strategy with the crowd favorite</size>
1番人気のウマ娘と作戦が同じだと\\n能力を少し発揮しやすい: <size=22>Become a little better at showing off your ability when sharing a strategy with the crowd favorite</size>
4番人気以下のレースで\\n能力を発揮しやすい: <size=22>Become better at showing off your ability when 4th favorite or below</size>
4番人気以下のレースで\\n能力を少し発揮しやすい: <size=22>Become a little better at showing off your ability when 4th favorite or below</size>
1番人気になる事が少し苦手になる: <size=22>Become worse when you're the crowd favourite of the race</size>
コーナーが得意になり\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Become better at corners, slightly increased speed</size>
ぎこちないコーナーワークで\\n加速力が少し下がる: <size=22>Slightly decreases acceleration because of awkward cornering</size>
無駄の多いコーナリングで\\n持久力が少し減少する: <size=22>Slightly reduces stamina because of wasteful cornering</size>
最終直線で最後方付近にいると\\n少しあきらめてしまいがちになる: <size=22>Tends to give up at the final straight line</size>
残り200m付近で先頭だと\\n少し油断しがちになる: <size=22>Tends to get off-guard when leading at the remaining 200m</size>
スタートが得意になり\\n出遅れる時間が少なくなる: <size=22>Improve Starts, decreases delay of Late Starts</size>
スタートが得意になり\\n出遅れる時間がわずかに少なくなる: <size=22>Improve Starts, slightly decreases delay of Late Starts</size>
スタートが苦手になり\\n出遅れる時間が少し増える: <size=22>Worse at starts, slightly increases delay of Late Starts</size>
レース序盤に前が詰まった時に\\n強い意志を保ち持久力が回復する: <size=22>Remain composed and recover stamina in Opening Leg if front-side is crowded</size>
レース序盤に前が詰まった時に\\n隠れて持久力がわずかに回復する: <size=22>Remain composed and slightly recover stamina in Opening Leg if front-side is crowded</size>
レース序盤にコース取りがうまくなる: <size=22>Become better at taking a good track position during the Opening Leg</size>
レース序盤にコース取りが\\n少しうまくなる: <size=22>Become a little better at taking position during the Opening Leg of the race</size>
レース中盤に追い抜くと\\n速度が上がる: <size=22>Increases speed when passing during the Middle Leg</size>
レース中盤に追い抜くと\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increases speed when passing during the Middle Leg</size>
レース中盤に追い抜かれると\\n持久力が回復する: <size=22>Recover stamina when passed in the Middle Leg</size>
レース中盤に追い抜かれると\\n持久力がわずかに回復する: <size=22>Slightly recover stamina when passed in the Middle Leg</size>
レース中盤に囲まれると\\n持久力が回復する: <size=22>Recover stamina when boxed in during the Middle Leg</size>
レース中盤に囲まれると\\n持久力がわずかに回復する: <size=22>Slightly recover stamina when boxed in during the Middle Leg</size>
ラストスパートで前が塞がれた時の\\n立ち回りがうまくなる: <size=22>When blocked during Last Spurt, become better at navigating through it</size>
ラストスパートで前が塞がれた時の\\n立ち回りがわずかにうまくなる: <size=22>When blocked during Last Spurt, become slightly better at navigating through it</size>
レース終盤にコース取りがうまくなる: <size=22>Become a little better at positioning during the Final Leg of the race</size>
レース終盤にコース取りが\\n少しうまくなる: <size=22>Become a little better at positioning during the Final Leg of the race</size>
ラストスパートで速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increases speed at the Last Spurt</size>
先頭で大きくリードし過ぎると\\n少し疲れてしまいがちになる: <size=22>Become a little tired if you lead at the beginning</size>
レース序盤で\\n前に行きやすくなる＜作戦・逃げ＞: <size=22>Runner・Moving forwards becomes easier during the Opening Leg</size>
レース序盤でわずかに\\n前に行きやすくなる＜作戦・逃げ＞: <size=22>Runner・Moving forwards becomes slightly easier during the Opening Leg</size>
レース中盤で\\n前に行きやすくなる＜作戦・逃げ＞: <size=22>Runner・Going forwards during the Middle Leg becomes easier</size>
レース中盤でわずかに\\n前に行きやすくなる＜作戦・逃げ＞: <size=22>Runner・Going forwards during the Middle Leg becomes slightly easier</size>
最終コーナーで先頭を\\nキープしやすくなる＜作戦・逃げ＞: <size=22>Runner・Keeping the lead on the final corner becomes easier</size>
最終コーナーで先頭をわずかに\\nキープしやすくなる＜作戦・逃げ＞: <size=22>Runner・Keeping the lead position on the final corner becomes slightly easier</size>
レース序盤で疲れにくくなる\\n＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・Harder to tire out during the Opening Leg</size>
レース序盤でわずかに疲れにくくなる\\n＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・Slightly harder to tire out during the Opening Leg</size>
レース中盤で疲れにくくなる\\n＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・Harder to tire during the Middle Leg</size>
レース中盤でわずかに疲れにくくなる\\n＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・Become slightly harder to tire during the Middle Leg</size>
最終コーナーで抜け出しやすくなる\\n＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・Passing becomes easier on the Final corner</size>
最終コーナーでわずかに\\n抜け出しやすくなる＜作戦・先行＞: <size=22>Leader・Passing becomes slightly easier on the Final corner</size>
レース中盤で速度がわずかに上がる\\n＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・Slightly increases speed during the Middle Leg</size>
レース終盤で加速力がわずかに上がる\\n＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・Slightly increases acceleration during the Final Leg</size>
最終コーナーで外から追い抜くと\\n速度が上がる＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・Increases speed when passing from the outside on the final corner</size>
最終コーナーで外から追い抜くと\\n速度がわずかに上がる＜作戦・差し＞: <size=22>Betweener・Slightly increases speed when passing from the outside on the final corner</size>
レース中盤に脚を溜めて\\n疲れにくくなる＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・Become harder to tire out during the Middle Leg</size>
レース中盤に脚を溜めて\\nわずかに疲れにくくなる＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・Become slightly harder to tire out during the Middle Leg</size>

レース終盤に追い込み態勢に入り\\n位置をわずかに上げる＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・Get ready to pass during the Final Leg and become slightly better at positioning</size>

ラストスパートの直線で\\n加速力がわずかに上がる＜作戦・追込＞: <size=22>Chaser・Slightly increases acceleration on the straight in the Last Spurt</size>

レース終盤に後ろの方だとわずかに\\nスパートしやすくなる＜短距離＞: <size=22>Short・Spurts become slightly easier when in the back of the pack during the Final Leg</size>
レース序盤に先頭だと\\n差を広げやすくなる＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・When in the lead in Opening Leg, extending the lead becomes easier</size>
レース序盤に先頭だとわずかに\\n差を広げやすくなる＜マイル＞: <size=22>Mile・When in the lead in Opening Leg, extending the lead becomes a little easier</size>
